attributes.action: not pay council tax on empty property after death
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My mum died in sept 2007 age 92 leaving her small flat to me but due to the economic down turn I have been unable to sell it.But how can it be justified to have to pay full council tax on an empty property due to death,when people on benefit,student houses,MPs are exempt and many more pay reduced retes I am 69 and my wife is 65 and we are still working and paying taxes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
